text:
If Perforce is only producing output on stderr, because for instance the Perforce password is 
wrong, ant currently stops executing. I saw this while testing the new globalopts attribute. 
This patch solves the problem.
creator: levylambert@tiscali-dsl.de

text:
Thanks Conor, it works.
I have tried to reconstruct the original problem with the old code but I 
did not manage to make it happen again. I hope I did not fix a red herring.
creator: levylambert@tiscali-dsl.de
